website_summaries.verdict: This model can be used as an oral, rectal, or armpit thermometer, so it gives you flexibility.
pros: Soft, flexible tips make it comfortable and easy to insert
cons: Lo" on display indicates low temperature, not low battery

customer_reviews.title: Finally found what I’ve been looking for....
customer_reviews.text: After buying so many of these from local pharmacy and other stores that were always off, I decided to Head here and look for one with good reviews. Happy to find that this one is a keeper! Also the company must have read your reviews because the thermometer now comes with the printed directions to calibrate it as well as an email. Only took a few minutes to calibrate.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Hedman

customer_reviews.title: Accurate - Family Friendly Thermometer
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer has a soft mouthpiece which makes it easier to hold in your mouth. It's quite accurate. You do receive a fast reading. The only problem is that when the reading is ready it produces a beeping noise. I cannot hear this beeping noise most of the time and never know when it is finished. I am not an old man. I am in my 40's and have moderately okay hearing. Other than this it is a very fine thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: C. D. WALKER

customer_reviews.title: Good price and product
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I have used the old school type and could never read it and our house got hit with the flu and realized enough was enough and ordered this one, wished I had done it sooner. Good price and product.
customer_reviews.author: Taynuh12

customer_reviews.title: ... read digital thermometer by Enji prime is a very nice set, It has a fast read digital display ...
customer_reviews.text: The fast read digital thermometer by Enji prime is a very nice set, It has a fast read digital display and comes in an attractive durable case. I really like the pack of slip covers for the end so you can be assured knowing that each time you use another cover, it is completely sterile. I would recommend this fast read thermometer on anyone from newborn to elderly.
customer_reviews.author: Julie A. Castro

customer_reviews.title: Fast and Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new thermometer for our diaper bag that was small and convenient. This one is exactly that. The rubber tip and quick read time makes it super easy and comfortable. We had no troubles using it on my 3 yr old. The company has great customer service and even sent an additional email explaining how to calibrate it the first time to ensure the best accuracy. Definitely recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kass

customer_reviews.title: Repeatedly offers consistent results!
customer_reviews.text: This works well and I like that the tip is somewhat flexible. Great delivery timing and process all together. Support this company; they followed up repeatedly and I was just too slow to acknowledge until now. :) I tested repeatedly for accuracy and consistency and was pleased, especially when I compared with the forehead (temporal) temperature thermometer I had been using.
customer_reviews.author: Titus Onderdonck

customer_reviews.title: Need a quick readout? This is the thermometer you want!
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer is basic, but it does the job! I was looking for a thermometer that didn't take too long to register. I was sick with the flu, and our old digital thermometer took forever to read a temp. It would just beep and beep and beep. This one is just a few seconds and you're done---exactly what I was looking for! The digital read out is large enough to read comfortably. Exactly what I was looking for in a new thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Carrigan

customer_reviews.title: Read my temp was 95 and 96 degrees - I almost went to the ER!
customer_reviews.text: Thought I had a high temperature as my face felt very hot, but when I used this thermometer to check, it said my temperature was dangerously low! Scared me so bad I was about to call a friend to drive me to the emergency room! Thankfully, it occurred to me that it might be malfunctioning. I decided first to check online to see if anyone else had experienced a false read of super low temperature, and they had.
customer_reviews.author: LA_Sinatra

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable...Don't play with your health!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely terrible. Worked seemingly accurately the first couple of times. Only two months later I got the flu with a high fever and this was apparently showing me 2 degrees lower than what I actually was. That is so dangerous!!! Knowing that, out of curiosity I checked to see what it would show for my temperature and my husband's when we are feeling fine and it is showing us both at 96...obviously not right!
customer_reviews.author: Nanizzy

customer_reviews.title: LOUSY. BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: WORST THERMOMETER. IT DOES NOT COME FULLY CALLIBRATED. (Yeah, they "forget" to mention that in the product details) Once you calibrate it yourself it's not accurate. It read my temp was 96.3! When tested right after with a Vics thermometer my temp was 98.00. This thermometer has a lot to be desired. Needless to say it was returned.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I work in the medical field and know that oral thermometers are much more accurate than temporal (forehead) thermometers. I bought this, followed the annoying calibration instructions (you have to take your temp 5 times and hold the thermometer under your tongue for over a minute to initially calibrate). Despite my compliance with these recommendations, the thermometer still does not work. I can't get a temperature above 97 (usually it reads 95-96). Don't waste your money. I'm going back to the Vick's brand that worked for me, but ran out of batteries...
customer_reviews.author: Ruffin Lowry

customer_reviews.title: Scam.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t read the temperature in 10 seconds, as stated in the instructions the temperature read is accurate after 3/5 minutes. It bips after 10 seconds but then temperature keeps going up and the reading after 3 minutes is totally different. Scam.
customer_reviews.author: Francesca R.

customer_reviews.title: Not as accurate as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these and tested longer than directed (used about 1 minute each instead of 10 seconds). One unit read 98.5F, the other read 99.1F. That is 0.6F difference. Tested a few more times for just 10 seconds as directed. Differences varried from 0 to 0.5 degereesF (not terrible, but not great either). I expected values a bit closer for accuracy. I would call these a decent "Ballpart Check" for accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: Whit T.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work after repeated tries
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst digital thermometer that I've ever bought. It's inaccurate. I read the instructions, which said that you need to calibrate it by keeping it in your mouth for 5 minutes the first time that you use it and then keeping it in your mouth a little longer the first few times that it's used. I followed these instructions and it still doesn't work. Digital thermometers are supposed to be fast and accurate - I will buy a different one.
customer_reviews.author: From DC

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable.
customer_reviews.text: The first thermometer I received didn't work at all and, I suspect based on the packaging, had already been returned once. I promptly returned it and received a replacement thermometer. The replacement worked great at first but now I'm getting a lot of error messages or it won't bother turning on at all. I've only had it a couple of weeks! I need a reliable thermometer for work and this isn't it. Switching to a different brand that can hold up to daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Dainty Trickster

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: It needs calibrating but the calibration appears to do nothing. It *does* return a reading in under 10 seconds, but not once has it reached a full 98 degrees, except during calibration where we have held it in our mouth for 5 full minutes. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with dead batteries, J U N K
customer_reviews.text: My product came with batteries that were pretty much dead. When I went to set it up per the instructions, it gave a beep sound that you knew right off the bathroom meant you wouldn't be able to use it. After leaving it in my mouth for 20 minutes to calibrate it, it still only read 78 degrees. ...useless piece of junk and looks like it came from the dollar store
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Kreisher

customer_reviews.title: Requires 5 minute calibration FIRST - didn't see that
customer_reviews.text: It requires a 5 minute calibration (in your mouth) before first use. I didn't notice that when I was ill. No giant sticker to alert the user. I'm skeptical if you calibrate it in your mouth if you have a fever vs. normal if it would give the correct result. Overall, I have no confidence in this product. I'm going to buy a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not read temperature properly.
customer_reviews.text: What I didn't like about this product was you have to calibrate It Yourself by holding it under your tongue for 5 minutes. After doing so checking my temperature again five different times I came up with a different reading every time. When I bought this product I intended use for my child and I. When you buy a thermometer the obvious intention of the thermometer is to get the correct temperature. This product will not do that. I am going to ask for my money back because this thing is useless to me.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Accurate thermometer and for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic thermometer. We have the worst luck finding decent, accurate thermometers but have finally found a really good one! We get the results fast (which is necessary with 2 kids under 5) and they are correct. The tip is super flexible and soft. The kids are always complaining that the tips of other thermometers hurt or poke them. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey M Rosenberg

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in August, followed the calibration instructions, and thankfully didn't need to use it till October. Now I find it is completely inaccurate. It's showing temps of 93.7 and 96 for my daughter and me respectively (taken under arm and orally). Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Polly

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: It's been almost impossible to find an accurate thermometer. I know, I've tried! I have 5 thermometers from the store. All of them are easier to operate than this one. They have a small pad that one pushes and they all basically function the same way. I get readings from 97.8 all the way to 99.8 all in the same 10 minutes. Give me my old mercury, hard to read thermometer. NO! not available! This one has a small rounded button which I'm only able to press with my middle finger and with arthritis it is painful. I think the reading is fairly accurate so I'll keep it, painfully!
customer_reviews.author: ALICE CIEPLY

customer_reviews.title: The one I got was junk
customer_reviews.text: After meticulously going through the calibration process, I get wildly disparate readings. And speaking of calibration - it uses ME as a calibration standard - WTF - what if I had a fever, the very reason I bought it was to check that. It should come calibrated to a medical standard. Temperature is a very critical measurement for lot of problems. Shame on Amazon for even selling this piece of junk, let alone recommending it.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money; difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't buy this again. I couldn't return it. It's difficult to use. The little plastic slip ons are so fragile and they rip. The thermometer didn't work. It kept malfunctioning and I held it under my baby's armpit for a while and still no reading. too many beeps. I wish I could return it. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: The calibration process failed. The thermometer read my body temperature as 94.3 degrees f and stayed there. Return cost a couple of bucks. They should pay me for the inconvenience
customer_reviews.author: McFadden Construction

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: This digital thermometer was worse than a $2 one you can buy at the Dollar General store at 5 times the cost. So very disappointed in it and returned it. Everyone has a temperature of 86 degrees!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Briscoe

customer_reviews.title: Gives the incorrect temperature
customer_reviews.text: I went through the complicated "calibration" procedure several times (never had to do this with a thermometer before. odd), but never could get the thing to register a temperature above 95 or 96 degrees. I'm not hypothermic, thank you. Calibrated it again - same thing. Again. Same thing. Gave up. Total waste of $14. Went to Target and bought one off the shelf that works great.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara O'Connell

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate at all.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve compared with 4 other thermometers because my son felt very warm and this thermometer was giving me temps in the low 80’s. I pulled out 4 others and they all read 103 or over. Even the doctors reading was above 103 and this one kept giving a very low temp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick-reading thermometer
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty nice thermometer. Once it is calibrated, per the enclosed instructions, it provides a much quicker temperature than my current digital thermometer. I did find the on/off button a little hard to press, but easier as I got used to it. All things considered, it is a good product at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Laura B.

customer_reviews.title: seems like good quality
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this a few times now and it seems like it is accurate, more so than the one that I was previously using. It measures within 10 seconds if you are doing oral measurement. If you do under arm it’s best to wait a couple of minutes for more accurate reading. I followed the instructions and did the calibration in the beginning. I like that it measures in Celsius as well as Fahrenheit.
customer_reviews.author: k-ny

customer_reviews.title: Worked "okay" for a short time
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer is trash to be honest. It worked "okay" for about a week (though I'm not sure if the readings were even accurate. We calibrated it like the instructions said, however on day 9 of owning it, my son wasn't feeling well, despite it reading a 97.2 F temp. Took him to urgent care and he had 102 F fever! Immediately threw this garbage away and bought something of higher quality. Don't do it, it's junk.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: I think it reads a little low
customer_reviews.text: You can get a reading quickly, and it's easy to use, but it always measures my temperature lower than I expect by a few degrees. Not 100% sure if my temperature just runs a little low or it's the thermometer. Couldn't do the ice test because it doesn't measure temperatures that low. Still good just to check that I don't have a fever and ease my worries that I've caught Covid-19.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Murchie-Beyma

customer_reviews.title: According to this pos my kid is dead
customer_reviews.text: Consistently low temps. I don’t know if I just got a bad one but this thing is junk. My kids average temp (according to this thing) was 90-93 degrees. Really? Son was burning up went to use it and it read 91. Ended up taking him to the dr and theirs says 102. Little off I’d say.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Accurate reading!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thermometer for my toddler when she spikes high fevers due to her medical issues. It’s an inexpensive thermometer and it does the job of getting an accurate temperature reading and she doesn’t mind it. Quick and accurate- 2 big pluses in my book with a squirmy toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing reviewer 1

customer_reviews.title: A should have
customer_reviews.text: after having a large expensive digital ear thermonitor for 24 years, it finally died. I purchased this one because a friend had one and loved it. I love this. The size is perfect. It's so easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Rene

customer_reviews.title: Fast paced
customer_reviews.text: Needed a lightweight thermometer to take with the family while we travel. We bought this thermometer because it's easy to operate with very few touches and we purchased probe covers which made sanitizing the thermometer a little less of a pressing issue when we're going down the road.
customer_reviews.author: DEE KAY

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer works great! The instructions walk you through how to calibrate the thermometer, and they are very clear and easy to follow. The thermometer comes with a few covers to get you started. So far, I've noticed no issues with this product. I am looking forward to using this product for while. Definitely worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Maia

customer_reviews.title: quick reading
customer_reviews.text: love this digital thermometer. not only is it compact size, the handle is easy grip and super quick to read. The tip is slightly flexible. our kids are grown, but we have been using for a preemie horse for daily temperature check and quick read for temp has been great, they are not good about holding still for long periods. However, I could see the human application for a child being awesome
customer_reviews.author: Lewis or Sherry Paulk

customer_reviews.title: Proof of death
customer_reviews.text: According to this thermometer I am dead. It's easy to read, my best temperature reached 96.5.
customer_reviews.author: doug chase

customer_reviews.title: not accurate.
customer_reviews.text: does not seem to be very accurate. I used it the first time without calibrating it- it was very inaccurate. read the instructions. then I calibrated it. it is still running 1 degree low for me. I have turned it off and on, used it a bunch of times, still off by a degree. no way of knowing if it is me or the thermometer.......
customer_reviews.author: whatdoiknow?

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Was not very happy with this thermometer. Stopped working within a week— not what you want with a newborn baby in the house. Was also complicated to set up. I went and got a different one for a little more money, and was way more satisfied. Also got multiple emails to write a review. I didn’t because I wasn’t happy with the product, but here you go.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Best overall
customer_reviews.text: If you follow the instructions/ calibration you'll know why this is the best thermometer in the market. It gives accurate measurements every time. As you may know, 100.4 is 38C which is considered a fever, if you get 100 then it's a law grade fever which some won't treat with medications. This thermometer would give you those accurate measurements to make sure that you do/don't have a fever and need to consider taking fever reducer medications
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup and read
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic thermometer. The tip is super flexible and soft. The thermometer is a great, affordable thermometer. It gives accurate measurements. The thermometer is accurate and I like that I can replace the batteries. Well made and accurate. Well packaged with easy to read instructions. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Higgins

customer_reviews.title: A ton of legwork just to take your first temperature!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because the description said "amazon recommended". I didn't even use it! The big deterrent here was the "calibration instructions". First you have to calibrate the thermometer by keeping it under your tongue for 5 minutes. If that's not enough work, try to remember for the next "2-4 uses" to keep the thermometer in your mouth for an extra 20 second after temperature reads to make sure it's adjusted or you could have an erroneous reading. Uh, no thank you! I"ll spend the extra 6 minutes and 20 seconds buying a turnkey thermometer from a major brand...
customer_reviews.author: HarborDweller

customer_reviews.title: Fast and inexpensive thermometer
customer_reviews.text: I liked how fast the temperature is available. 15 seconds. I wish the little button were larger and sometimes it needs to be pressed more than once to get a reading. The price is unbeatable for the accuracy. It is very small and light, so it is easy to carry with you. It arrived on time and well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Skip Wood

customer_reviews.title: TOTAL GARBAGE!
customer_reviews.text: Buyer Beware... This thermometer consistently registered two points below normal temperature and is totally worthless. Unfortunately I should’ve paid closer attention to the reviews, which are 29% negative.
customer_reviews.author: Tess from New York

customer_reviews.title: Thermometer is accurate and easy to use... all is well.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a thermometer and came across this one. I used to have a forehead thermometer and I hated it. It always gave me different temperatures. After a 7 minute calibration, it was good to go. I tested it 3 times and it gave the same accurate number each time. The flexible tip is a great feature for adults with small children, especially infants and toddlers teething. It takes 10 seconds to check your temperature. The instructions are clearly written and with ease, you'll be ready to use the thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Very, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: If I could give a negative star, I would have done so. This product is one of the basic essentials in this time of crisis. I ordered it as I badly needed it. After 19 days of waiting instead of getting the thermometer, I got a package and inside it was a paint and another one that seems use to seal the paint whatever. I was so upset. How on earth will a company make such ridiculous mistake ? Why can’t they just say there is no stock or it is not available. No explanation at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it, quick reading, would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought this when my son was born a year ago, I love that it reads temperature so quickly since he is a baby it is very hard to hold a thermometer in for too long. I believe it is very accurate since I have taken my son to the hospital with a fever and the reading at the hospital matches his temp from home. Good quality, good price, would recommend and buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: I purchased three of this product, and all of ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased three of this product because of the sign of FDA + the accuracy (+-0.2 F) + lower price + amazingly higher and many recommendations, and all of them have defected(measured lower degree than actual temperature orally - about 1 Fahrenheit). It is cheap but malfunctioned. Not worth at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Difficult, Slow & Most of All Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Worthless PoS! Followed calibration instructions to the letter, still gives inaccurate readings.
customer_reviews.author: Paraducks

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes not accurate. I've tested it with a hospital one.
customer_reviews.text: I work in a hospital setting and I've tested this side by side with the thermometers in the hospital. This device is sometimes off and is not accurate at all. Take it for what it's worth but dont expect 100% accuracy. You'll get a good reading once in awhile.
customer_reviews.author: ap619

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work, so there's absolutely no point.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this thermometer is not very accurate, rendering it basically useless. If my body temperature was really 89 degrees all the time... I'd be dead. Since I'm not dead, I have to conclude that this thing is just rubbish.
customer_reviews.author: Nitewender

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t come calibrated
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer does not come calibrated. The instructions say it needs to be under your tongue for 5 minutes to calibrate and even when I did it read all over the place. Definitely not worth it. I used it a handful of times and it read a 94 or 95
customer_reviews.author: Loyal Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never measured temperature correctly
customer_reviews.text: The temperatures measured by this thermometer would vary greatly for readings performed within seconds of each other. The thermometer also broke completely within six months, after fewer than a dozen uses.
customer_reviews.author: February

customer_reviews.title: Trash. Always reports 97.
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer is trash. They must have paid for these reviews. It broke in under a year and was never accurate. I was extremely sick this weekend with a 103 fever and this reported 97. It always reported 97.
customer_reviews.author: Free Radical

customer_reviews.title: According to the Enji Prime Thermometer, my dog is actually walking around dead or with hypothermia.
customer_reviews.text: Does not work at all. According to the Enji Prime Thermometer, my dog is actually walking around dead or with hypothermia and I was trying to check if he had a fever. Worst lightening deal ever...
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: A fine little inexpensive back up thermometer.
customer_reviews.text: I recommend as a neonatal and pediatric intensive care health care provider for 20+ yrs to take traveling or to toss in a first aid kit. If you have kids and/or involved with them (i.e. Boy Scouts as we are) could provide invaluable info at the right time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: For all ages
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it to use on my baby, but shes just to fussy to stay still long enough to get a reading. And it’s only about 10 seconds! Only person to blame for that is the baby! So... I tried it on myself a few weeks after calibrating it, and it works perfectly!! Definitely a must have for every household, regardless of age.
customer_reviews.author: De3

customer_reviews.title: Not a 10 second one !!
customer_reviews.text: Readings are accurate. But it doesn’t give the reading in 10 seconds as advertised. Every time I spend at least 2 to 3 minutes to get the reading. By that time my 2 year old loses patience and gets cranky ( not to forget she is sick too) . It’s like any other thermometer that takes it’s whole time . Wouldn’t recommend if you are looking for fast ones.
customer_reviews.author: Saranya

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate, cant trust it.
customer_reviews.text: I must have gotten a bad one, I just returned ed it. I did the calibration you have to do, ut everytime I take my temp it is different. I just did it 3 times. 97.5, then 102.1, now it says 98.7.... armpit right now says 97.1..... returned
customer_reviews.author: Niko

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money and it doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: This is the WORST thermometer. Do NOT purchase this thermometer unless you plan to calibrate it by skipping backwards all while cartwheeling for the ridiculous five minutes it requires. You will be sweating from your eyeballs after the five minutes because the damn thing still won’t be calibrated. Your baby will be classified as dead because the calibration didn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: hawthorn

customer_reviews.title: not so much
customer_reviews.text: this thermometer is a little ridiculous... You have to calibrate it and that's not that easy to do... I do not rely on it for an accurate reading as it was way off several times... I would not buy it again sadly
customer_reviews.author: Goldilocks

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer takes forever to read. It actually never reaches the correct temperature. I bought this for my infant and well it makes it difficult to get an accurate reading within a short amount of time. Save your money and buy something better.
customer_reviews.author: kristopher c.

customer_reviews.title: Fast, easy, accurate temperature readings
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted a simple, consistent way to track basal temperatures, and this thermometer is great. I get a reading in about 20 seconds (3x faster than my old one), and it comes with its own convenient protective cover. It's a great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: JLGGeekTop Contributor: Raspberry Pi

customer_reviews.title: Having a fast thermometer is nice allowing one to take multiple readings and find an ...
customer_reviews.text: Having a fast thermometer is nice allowing one to take multiple readings and find an average. More reliable (especially with small children) than taking a single slower reading.
customer_reviews.author: NWLokstars

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: Our baby girl was in the hospital last week due to a fever from a common cold she got from her siblings. After the hospital scare, it was very important to me that we receive an accurate thermometer since I was nervous about another fever. After a lot of research, we decided on this thermometer, and we couldn’t be happier with our purchase! We received our thermometer a few days ago and have used it on our six week old baby. It was easy to calibrate (we just followed the simple instructions sent via email prior to the arrival of the thermometer), appears to be accurate, gives quick temperatures, and is easy to use. I would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Accuracy.
customer_reviews.text: As advertised,This thermometer is one of the best I have use In many years.Easy to read and it gives you the reading accurately in less than ten second.Love it
customer_reviews.author: Damon Huerto

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money! The temp is never correct and by the time I really needed it for my sick daughter, and realized it did not work, it was too late to return. Otherwise I would have returned for my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No light ~ Takes more then 10 seconds
customer_reviews.text: I'm so bummed it didn't have a light! It doesn't do what it says it does. AnD I can barely read it! Its Not for us Seniors, that's for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S.

customer_reviews.title: Piece of poop.
customer_reviews.text: Very inaccurate gives you a different reading every time you use it. yes we quote-unquote calibrated it.. what a joke
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it!
customer_reviews.text: Temperature never comes out right. The first try I had a 94.2 degree reading. Not okay. An hour later I read 95.1. I took my temperature with another thermometer and it read 98.8. Read the directions completely to see if I did something wrong (I know you are wondering how you could do something wrong taking a temp) but I did it right.
customer_reviews.author: mcz

customer_reviews.title: 10 sec reading thermometer by Enji not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Doest not live up to expectations. I followed instruction to a tee. first left at room temperature and than using orally and waiting 5minutes. but it does not beep. Just wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Bird

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate crap
customer_reviews.text: Right when I received this product, I followed the directions and tried to calibrate it. The calibration on the initial temperature was inaccurate and any further readings were also inaccurate. I brought the product to the dr's office to get it ready when my baby was due, but I just ended up returning this POS. I tried multiple attempts at calibrating and even trying it on another person, but it was still off. Returned! Got an ear thermometer instead, bettter! Don't get a forehead scan either.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: I would give this 0 stars if I could
customer_reviews.text: HORRIBLE product. You have to spend all this time calibrating it when it arrives, then recalibrate the first few times you use it, then leave it in the open air for 30 minutes before you use it each time. Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn Myers

customer_reviews.title: I got the broken thermometer!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived, calibrated as instructed, used the product for 2~3 times, then alarm sound weakened and screen went blank. The product suddenly died on me with no apparent cause. Must have been defective. Contacted Enji yesterday for replacement, but not heard back yet.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Is ok to have it
customer_reviews.text: Good to compliment another thermometer you might have. I have the fronthead one and I use this one under the arm pit to confirm when there is high fever. Digital screen is too small( or maybe I am way too blind)
customer_reviews.author: D Rodz

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer didn’t work from day 1. WAY OFF on actual temperature. Forgot to return, so out of my money. Do not waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy F.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for a month or two, now wildly inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for the few months. Now it shows wildly inaccurate temperatures every time. It went from 95.6 to 91.7 to 97.2 when taking my temp 3 times in a row (orally). Never submerged it in water to clean, only used alcohol swabs. Not sure what could've caused this malfunction but its definitely not trustworthy anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Trent H.

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a back up. It works great but the clear cover does not stay on for storage. It is easy to use. The packaging wasn't the greatest the thermometer was out of the box just laying in the bottom of the bubble mailer. Over all good product
customer_reviews.author: April Gravert

customer_reviews.title: couldn't get accurate reading
customer_reviews.text: Even after following the calibration instructions, I couldn't get an accurate reading with this one. The display was also teeny-tiny and did not have a light. However I did appreciate the seller sending an email with instructions and other information- two stars for good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: I calibrated the item as per the instructions- then let it sit for over an hour (instructions said at least 30 min) every time I have used the thermometer it has said something REALLY low. Anywhere from 94-96- ugh. I bought another brand from the store for the same price that works properly and much faster than this product.
customer_reviews.author: Paul N.

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: This product is garbage. Doesn;t go above 97.6 degrees despite multiple attempts to calibrate. Buy a different product.
customer_reviews.author: TheOne

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Packaged perfectly! I was looking on line for a digital medical thermometer and this one showed some pictures of how to use the thermometer. I need it for my cat and when I saw the picture of the cat I knew this was the one! My vet is happy I can take my cats temperature and give her an update. So simple to use, accurate and it's very easy to use on my cat...although he doesn't like it!
customer_reviews.author: Paris Butvin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use and Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer has a more streamlined style than the one it replaced. It is also lighter in weight making it easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: shipping was quick , packaging was great . Thermometer came in just as pictured i was excited it has more than 200 hours of battery operation and a break resistant child safe probe . Reading the thermometer is easy , results come up quikly and if you need to re-read old results it keeps them .
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Quick, small, and accurate!
customer_reviews.text: This may be the only under arm thermometer my 4 year old doesn't fuss about. Great product, great price! And it came just in time for a virus to hit my house.
customer_reviews.author: Stephane Wahl

customer_reviews.title: Too much work with no results.
customer_reviews.text: I keep trying to like this bc of all the good reviews but the readings keep coming in low. I’ve tried on myself and my two kids and it doesn’t seem accurate at all. I can’t figure out how to make it work right. Not a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mrykt

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoy this thermometer
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer is not only affordable but has the features I look for including a 10 second read, it remembers the last temperature recorded (very important for monitoring sick children) and has the ability to take the temperature via one of three different methods.
customer_reviews.author: chrisx2mom

customer_reviews.title: Fast and Seems To Be Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Seems well made and accurate when tested (calibrated) against my other thermometer. I am hoping it lasts as long as the one I am replacing with it. I like the idea of being able to replace the battery.
customer_reviews.author: MrsMac

customer_reviews.title: Bad buy
customer_reviews.text: Worst thermometer. It gives me a different read every time I use it.
customer_reviews.author: shannonelaines

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, not convinced at accuracy
customer_reviews.text: Not as accurate as I need it to be. Followed instructions for setting up initial use, but get a variety of temps with each use.
customer_reviews.author: akusmc06

customer_reviews.title: DON'T. BUY CHEAP
customer_reviews.text: This is the most cheesy product I've ever bought I would never buy this again I don't recommend anybody to buy this it's a piece of crap it doesn't work
customer_reviews.author: Alvin Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Not accurate. Bought this for my pregnant pup. Rushed her into vet bc of the reading on this . They gave me one from their office after they compared temps. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Ria

customer_reviews.title: a thermometer should not require 5 minutes to calibrate...this is 2018, no?
customer_reviews.text: it's a thermometer...it should give the temperature without much fuss or second thought, and it does not even get that right. It is poorly designed which inadvertently makes you distrust the reading. Also, why such a microscopic display? One word: fail
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works as it should, I followed the included instructions on how to get the thermometer ready for normal use and it was pretty simple to calibrate. Takes an accurate temperature via under my tongue. No issues so far!
customer_reviews.author: Brittney A

customer_reviews.title: Works well enough.
customer_reviews.text: Great first thermometer. Not the most sophisticated but works well.
customer_reviews.author: katie cowsar

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Easy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as I wasn't sure if we had a thermometer any more as kids are all gone. Husband had major surgery and thought it would be a good idea to have one. The day after we got home from hospital he felt warm so had this thermometer right by the bed and within 10 seconds knew his temp was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Beth F

customer_reviews.title: In the trash
customer_reviews.text: This item malfunctioned about 40% of usages. The screen was too small to read conveniently. I did not return it. I threw it in the trash. Good riddance.
customer_reviews.author: Cornelius L Cassady

customer_reviews.title: My go to thermometer
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of this thermometer, I’ve had to use it twice in the tim I’ve had it. The colored half is silicone feeling so it doesn’t bother baby when using it The temp is clear and big. I would definitely recommend this to all the mamas.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha
